mapper.insert: insert into mtb_option_branch (order_pattern, sub_item_code, model_code, option_code, option_branch_code, standard_available, tuxedo_available, washable_available, option_name, option_branch_name, option_branch_price, option_branch_double_price, display_order, created_user_id, created_at, updated_user_id, updated_at) values (#{orderPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionBranchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tuxedoAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{washableAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionBranchPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{optionBranchDoublePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{displayOrder,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select order_pattern, sub_item_code, model_code, option_code, option_branch_code, standard_available, tuxedo_available, washable_available, option_name, option_branch_name, option_branch_price, option_branch_double_price, display_order, created_user_id, created_at, updated_user_id, updated_at from mtb_option_branch

select DISTINCT order_pattern, sub_item_code, option_code, option_branch_code, standard_available, tuxedo_available, washable_available, option_branch_name, display_order, created_user_id, created_at, updated_user_id, updated_at from mtb_option_branch where standard_available = '1' and order_pattern = #{orderPattern} order by display_order

select DISTINCT order_pattern, sub_item_code, option_code, option_branch_code, standard_available, tuxedo_available, washable_available, option_branch_name, display_order, created_user_id, created_at, updated_user_id, updated_at from mtb_option_branch where tuxedo_available = '1' and order_pattern = #{orderPattern} order by display_order

select DISTINCT order_pattern, sub_item_code, option_code, option_branch_code, standard_available, tuxedo_available, washable_available, option_branch_name, display_order, created_user_id, created_at, updated_user_id, updated_at from mtb_option_branch where washable_available = '1' and order_pattern = #{orderPattern} order by display_order

select order_pattern, sub_item_code, model_code,option_code, option_branch_code, standard_available, tuxedo_available, washable_available, option_branch_name, option_branch_price, option_branch_double_price, display_order, created_user_id, created_at, updated_user_id, updated_at from mtb_option_branch where order_pattern = #{orderPattern} order by display_order

select DISTINCT order_pattern, sub_item_code, option_code, option_branch_code, standard_available, tuxedo_available, washable_available, option_branch_name, display_order, created_user_id, created_at, updated_user_id, updated_at from mtb_option_branch where sub_item_code = '99' and item_code = '99' and order_pattern = #{orderPattern} order by display_order
